messages.subject: Homeschooling Reflections
messages.msgSnippet: Sorry, I sure didn t mean to offend anyone.? I am very real - started homeschooling in 1981, and was so fortunate to have John Holt as a lunch guest in my
messages.messageBody:
Sorry,

I sure didn't mean to offend anyone.? I am very real - started homeschooling in 1981, and was so fortunate to have John Holt as a lunch guest in my home, and I was able to attend talks he gave out here in San Diego area.? The youngest two kids attended school a bit, then?after we started being at home, no one went to school til college.? ?I haven't been active on the list as my kids are now very grown - I have 5 from nearly 21 to 37.? We did unschool and had a great little support group here.? Actually it happens that 3 of the moms that live away will be in town, so we are having a gathering at my home this weekend.? We are now women in our 50's-60's.?

Sanda wrote a little blurb for the back cover of my book.

Once again - sorry if my post was off-putting (and I have donated books to my local libraries already :-)? )

Peace,
Connie


Connie Colten
619-562-0867 - cell - 619-301-0592




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
